required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: UNCOVER - a Non-interventional Study to Investigate Undiagnosed Severe Asthma
clinical_study.official_title: UNCOVER - a Non-interventional Study to Investigate Undiagnosed Severe Asthma

lead_sponsor.agency: Karl Landsteiner Institute for Clinical and Experimental Pneumology

collaborator.agency: Universitätsklinik für Innere Medizin II, Pulmologie

clinical_study.source: Karl Landsteiner Institute for Clinical and Experimental Pneumology

brief_summary.textblock: UNCOVER is a non-interventional study to investigate the prevalence of difficult-to-treat and severe Asthma eligible for treatment with biologics in a cohort of patients with suspected, so far undiagnosed severe Asthma which were previously treated by General practitioners and Office-based pulmonologists.

primary_outcome.measure: The Primary objective is the Investigation of the prevalence of difficult-to-treat and severe Asthma eligible for Treatment with biologics.
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with diagnosis of severe Asthma according to the ATS/ERS Definition of severe Asthma and number of severe Asthma patients eligible for one or more biologic Treatments for Asthma.

study_pop.textblock: Female and male patients are eligible for this non-interventional study when fulfilling all criteria for inclusion and None of the criteria for exclusion. 400 patients will be enrolled.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 18 years of age or older at inclusion
- written informed consent
- currently diagnosed with Asthma fulfilling at least one of the criteria of potential severe Asthma
- willing and able to complete the study questionnaire miniAQLQ
Exclusion Criteria:
- biological Treatment for Asthma during the past 12 months
- participation in a clinical Trial within the last 3 months
- patients who are not able to read or write, who do not understand the nature of the study or the ICF or who are dependent from the investigator

overall_official.affiliation: Head of Karl Landsteiner Institut for Clinical and Experimental Pneumology

facility.name: Karl Landsteiner Institute for Clinical and Experimental Pneumology, Klinik Hietzing
